statements: SELECT * FROM cultural_heritage_sites
SELECT site_name, location FROM cultural_heritage_sites
SELECT site_name, date_established FROM cultural_heritage_sites WHERE location = 'Rome'
SELECT * FROM cultural_heritage_sites ORDER BY date_established DESC
SELECT site_name, description FROM cultural_heritage_sites WHERE historical_significance LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM cultural_heritage_sites WHERE site_name = 'Great Wall'
SELECT site_name, location, date_established FROM cultural_heritage_sites ORDER BY date_established DESC
SELECT site_name, location, description FROM cultural_heritage_sites WHERE location LIKE '%rome%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sites FROM cultural_heritage_sites
SELECT site_name, historical_significance FROM cultural_heritage_sites WHERE historical_significance IS NOT NULL ORDER BY site_id ASC
SELECT * FROM cultural_heritage_sites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM cultural_heritage_sites;
SELECT site_id, site_name, site_location FROM cultural_heritage_sites WHERE site_location='Paris';
SELECT * FROM monuments ORDER BY year_built DESC;
SELECT monument_name, monument_type FROM monuments WHERE year_built > 1800;
SELECT * FROM cultural_heritage_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC, site_location ASC;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM cultural_heritage_sites WHERE LENGTH(site_description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM monuments WHERE monument_type = 'Statue' AND year_built >= 1800 ORDER BY year_built ASC;
SELECT monument_name, year_built FROM monuments WHERE monument_location LIKE '%Europe%' OR monument_location LIKE '%Asia%';
SELECT site_name, site_location, LENGTH(site_description) AS description_length FROM cultural_heritage_sites ORDER BY description_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM heritage_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM heritage_sites ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT site_name, location, date_established FROM heritage_sites WHERE date_established < '2000-01-01';
SELECT monument_name, architect FROM monuments WHERE year_built >= 1800 ORDER BY architect DESC;
SELECT image_url, caption FROM images WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT site_id, site_name, location, date_established, description FROM heritage_sites;
SELECT * FROM monuments WHERE year_built > 1900 ORDER BY monument_name DESC;

SELECT site_name, architect, year_built FROM monuments INNER JOIN heritage_sites ON monuments.site_id = heritage_sites.site_id WHERE architect LIKE 'Famous Architect%' AND year_built BETWEEN 1800 AND 2000;
SELECT image_url, caption FROM images WHERE site_id = 1;

SELECT monument_name, architect, year_built, site_name FROM monuments INNER JOIN heritage_sites ON monuments.site_id = heritage_sites.site_id WHERE architect IS NOT NULL ORDER BY year_built ASC, site_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM cultural_heritage_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM cultural_heritage_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT monument_name, year_built FROM monuments ORDER BY year_built DESC;
SELECT country_name, continent, population FROM countries WHERE population > 100000000;
SELECT category_name, description FROM categories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT site_name, location, description FROM cultural_heritage_sites
SELECT monument_name, year_built, architect FROM monuments
SELECT country_name, continent, population FROM countries
SELECT monument_name, architect, year_built FROM monuments
SELECT category_name, description FROM categories
SELECT * FROM cultural_heritage_sites;
SELECT id, site_name, location FROM cultural_heritage_sites WHERE country = 'Italy';
SELECT location, site_name, country FROM cultural_heritage_sites ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, monument_name, year_built FROM monuments WHERE year_built > 1500;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM cultural_heritage_sites;
SELECT site_name, country, location FROM cultural_heritage_sites ORDER BY country, site_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT monument_name, location, year_built FROM monuments WHERE year_built >= 1800 ORDER BY year_built DESC, monument_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, location, date FROM historical_events WHERE date BETWEEN '1800-01-01' AND '1900-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT artifact_name, type, origin, description FROM cultural_artifacts WHERE type = 'Sculpture' ORDER BY artifact_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT org_name, country, headquarters FROM cultural_organizations WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY org_name ASC LIMIT 5;
